name: Accel World Stage 02: The Peak of Acceleration
name_original: Accel World Stage 02: The Peak of Acceleration
description:
Accel World Stage 02: The Peak of Acceleration is a strategy game. It came out on 31-01-2013. Bandai published the game.
You can play Accel World Stage 02: The Peak of Acceleration on PSP and PlayStation 3.
